data.name: Agile Kanban İstanbul 2020
data.description: Get Agile with Kanban. Kanban System Design - A System Thinking Approach to Evolutionary Change or your existing Kanban knowledge. By focusing on the complex demands of a multi-teamed organization, we explore how to keep momentum beyond initial improvements realized.

data.name: Design
data.description: Design, user interface, and user experience conferences.

data.name: DevSecOps Days - Tokyo
data.description: Meet fellow practitioners integrating security into their DevOps practices at the first Tokyo event. Learn about their journeys, share ideas on integrating security into your teams, and trade insights on automating security tools in your DevOps pipeline.
